item.title: 3 dead, including 2 children, in New Mexico flooding, local authorities say
item.description: The Village of Ruidoso said three people died in "historic" flash flooding.

item.title: US measles cases hit highest number in 33 years, CDC data shows
item.description: Measles cases in the United States have reached their highest number in more than 30 years, according to new federal data published Wednesday.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
